patthana16.42:1.1_0: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naatītassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.42:1.1_1: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naanāgatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.42:1.1_2: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naatītassa nahetussa ca naanāgatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha,
patthana16.42:1.1_3: anantare tīṇi …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
